title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces Technology Certification of Binomo Trading Platform

content.rendered:
December 11, 2018 – The Financial Commission today announces the technology certification of the Binomo trading platform.

Financial Commission conducted its rigorous review of Binomo’s trading platform to ensure it met the technical information requirements of the Commission’s technology certification evaluation process. The Financial Commission established a comprehensive list of requirements in order to verify system security, capacity, business disaster recovery, and continuity plan, as well as reporting and record keeping, among other fields deemed important for the technology certification of Binomo.

Financial Commission Chairman Peter Tatarnikov said regarding the new certification, “The Binomo trading platform is the latest technology certified by the Financial Commission and we are pleased that yet another broker is certifying their products with us. Today we can confirm that the Binomo platform satisfies the relevant certification criteria outlined by our organization.”

About Binomo

Binomo is a convenient and simple platform for trading the most popular assets of following asset classes: currencies (FOREX), cryptocurrencies, stocks, and commodities. The platform offers market analysis tools and interactive price charts, as well as robust account management tools built in directly on the platform. For traders on the go, Binomo features mobile apps for smartphones to take trading anywhere. For those who are just starting their path in trading or those who want to improve their skills, Binomo offers a free demo account with unlimited virtual funds and a flexible education system.

About Financial Commission

The Financial Commission is an external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes with financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission.

The Financial Commission was established to be a neutral 3rd party committee to fairly review and resolve complaints in an effort to facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution than through industry regulators and the legal system.

With a mission to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading the Forex market, Financial Commission provides unmatched benefits to brokerages and their underlying clients.

Technology developers seeking membership status with the Financial Commission can learn more about the process and expected requirements as part of the technology certification process in advance of applying for membership or in the preparation of submitting an application.

For more information, please contact The Financial Commission: info@financialcommission.org.
